text: Mata fushinjin-sha-tachi ga, anata (muhanmado) ni taishi ikaga ni sakubo shita ka o omoiokoshi nasai. Anata o kokin shi, aruiwa satsugai shi, aruiwa mata hochiku shiyou to shita. Kare-ra wa sakubo shitaga, arra mo mata keiryaku o megurase rareta. Hontoni arra wa mottomo sugureta keiryaku-sha de ara reru
